channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15849] Shell Cleanup: Simplify handling of commands' runtime
item.description: Functions format_simple_command and format_and_return_simple_command are used to print runtimes right now. They are called from within every single command and use Ruby's 'yield' magic. Instead, we can simplify it using 'command_safe' function. Since command_safe wraps all commands, we can simply time before and after we call individual command.
item.summary: Shell Cleanup: Simplify handling of commands' runtime

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Stack +1ed on review board.
Committed to master.
